description: These vegan sweet potato pancakes are incredibly rich and flavorful, made a hint of cinnamon and nutmeg, and are topped with orange infused maple syrup.
name: Vegan Sweet Potato Pancakes with Orange Infused Maple Syrup
recipeIngredient: 1 medium sweet potato (baked and mashed (about 1 cup)
2 1/4 cups unflavored almond or soy milk
1 1/2 cups spelt flour (could sub all purpose)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat all ingredients in small saucepan and bring to a low boil.
Lower heat and simmer about ten minutes, or longer to get a slightly thicker syrup. You can prepare your pancakes while the syrup simmers.
